en.title: Choose your personal CV website
en.subtitle: Professional, dynamic, editable
en.step2: Select the package that suits you (Basic or Standard)
en.step3: Fill in the form with your details
en.how_it_works_desc: We will contact you soon with all the details and instructions for the implementation.
en.select_template: Choose one of the templates trusted by professionals
en.form_title: Fill out the form and we will contact you!
en.chatbot_msg: Hello! ğŸ‘‹ Want help finding the right template?
en.form_bio: Short bio (e.g. what you do, your studies etc.)
en.form_purpose: Where will you use the CV site? (LinkedIn, job search, blog...)
en.faq_q1: How much does a CV site cost?
en.faq_a1: There are two main packages: BASIC at â‚¬179 (static site, mobile friendly, 5 free minor edits) and Standard at â‚¬299 (editable, unlimited changes, 1-year domain, and 30 days support). So you can choose what suits you best!
en.faq_q2: How long will it take for my site to be ready?
en.faq_a2: Usually, your site is ready within 1 to 4 business days after you send us the necessary info and material. Depending on the package and any extra requirements, the time may vary slightly.
en.faq_a3: Of course! You can change texts, photos, colors, and fonts. If you choose the Standard package, you can make as many changes as you want, even after delivery, through the dashboard or with our help.
en.faq_q4: Will I be able to edit the site myself?
en.faq_a4: Yes! With the Standard+ package, you get access to an easy-to-use dashboard to update your site content whenever you want, no technical skills needed. For the BASIC package, you can request up to 5 small changes for free.
en.faq_q5: What do I need to send to get started?
en.faq_a5: Just fill out the interest form with your basic info. Weâ€™ll need your CV, a photo, contact details, and anything else you want to show on your site. The more complete your info, the faster we can start!
en.faq_q6: Can I buy my own domain and have you connect it?
en.faq_a6: Absolutely! If you already have a domain or want to buy one yourself, we can connect it to your site at no extra cost. Alternatively, with the Standard+ package, we handle the purchase and management of your domain for the first year.
en.faq_q7: Can I link my site to LinkedIn or other socials?
en.faq_a7: Yes, you can add links to LinkedIn, GitHub, email, or even your personal domain. This way, visitors can easily find all your profiles and contact info.
en.faq_q8: Do you provide support after delivery?
en.faq_a8: With the Standard package, you get free support for 30 days after delivery for any changes or questions. After that, you can choose a support plan or request individual services as needed.
en.footer_desc: Professional CV sites in Greek. Simple, dynamic, editable.
en.chatbot_purpose: What do you need your site for?
